segments.text: And we got a 50 thousand dollar ticket for construction workers peeing off the roof .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s great . Is the electrician here today ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: See , I just told you he hit a deer . Man , I knew you weren ’ t listening to me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ re right . I wasn ’ t . I hear nothing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not a sound on the city streets , just the beat of my own heart , I think that ’ s how it goes , something like that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You and Patricia got engaged , didn ’ t you ? You can tell me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ? I thought you liked Patricia .
segments.speaker: S1
